channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: McKinsey challenges graduates to master AI tools as it shifts hiring hunt toward liberal arts majors
item.description: CEO Bob Sternfels says the company has 60,000 employees—including 20,000 AI agents.

item.title: Trump hails ‘booming investment’ in Detroit while auto manufacturing jobs have fallen every month since Liberation Day
item.description: The industrial heartland faces a grim arithmetic: Billions in new investment are pouring in, but the workers are being left behind.

item.title: Iran Strikes Musk’s Starlink—First ‘Electronic Warfare’ Attack
item.description: Iran launches an unprecedented attack on Starlink, making it "barely usable."

item.title: The Top Takeaway From CES 2026: ‘Everything Is Being Recorded’
item.description: From time shifting to being ambiently observed, the big learnings from CES 2026 were quietly nuanced yet loudly profound.

item.title: UFC 324 Loses Championship Fight After Injury, What’s Next?
item.description: Kayla Harrison is out of UFC 324 after neck surgery. Here's what happened, when she might fight Amanda Nunes, and the updated Las Vegas card.

item.title: Whole Foods cofounder says his hardest ever business decision was firing his father from his company board: ‘That was when my mentorship was over’
item.description: John Mackey calls capitalism one of humanity's greatest inventions and sticks to that way of thinking, even when family's involved. "It hurt him so ba...

item.title: How Expedia’s CTO is using AI to transform work for 17,000 employees—and travel for millions
item.description: The online travel agency has invested in AI to boost the productivity for Expedia's workforce and make travel hiccups easier for consumers to navigate...

item.title: The Costliest Pickup Trucks Now Command Six-Figure Sticker Prices
item.description: Affordability goes out the window when the industry’s workhorses can be configured like thoroughbreds.

item.title: Citigroup CEO Jane Fraser warns of job cuts and says it’s time to raise the bar in a fiery memo to staff: ‘We are not graded on effort’
item.description: Fortune's Most Powerful Woman on Wall Street is cutting 1,000 jobs now, with tens of thousands more to come as she says "old, bad habits" are over.

item.title: Verizon Down — New Outage Impacts Hundreds Of Thousands Of Users And Growing
item.description: The carrier has suffered a major outage across the U.S. in the last few hours and it’s not over yet. Here’s the latest.

Wall Street now wondering how Trump tariffs align with his ‘affordability’ pivot

item.title: Global central bank leaders back Fed Chair Powell amid federal investigation
item.description: Global central bank leaders rallied behind Fed Chair Jerome Powell as he faces criminal investigation from Trump administration over perjury allegatio...

item.title: JPMorgan CFO warns Trump's proposed credit card cap could cause people to 'lose access to credit'
item.description: JPMorgan CFO Jeremy Barnum warned that President Trump's proposed 10% credit card interest rate cap could hurt the economy and reduce access to credit...

item.title: Inflation held steady in December, remaining well above the Fed's 2% target

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
